Public NotInheritable Class FlowDecision Inherits FlowNode

summary.span: 提供以兩種結果建立條件式節點模型之功能的特定 。

span.span: A specialized that provides the ability to model a conditional node with two outcomes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的條件，並定義條件時要採取的動作`true`或`false`。 uses a condition and defines actions to take if the condition is `true` or `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 節點。The following code sample demonstrates creating a node. 這個範例取自[錯誤處理流程圖活動使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)範例。This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_FlowChartWithFaultHandling#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_flowchartwithfaulthandling/cs/program.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Condition As Activity(Of Boolean)
public: property System::Activities::Activity<bool> ^ Condition { System::Activities::Activity<bool> ^ get(); void set(System::Activities::Activity<bool> ^ value); };

summary.span: 指定 正在測試的條件。

span.span: Specifies the condition the is testing.
A value expression that represents the condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果條件評估為`true`、中執行屬性。If the condition evaluates to `true`, the in the property is executed. 否則，即執行 屬性中的 。Otherwise the in the property is executed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 節點的 Condition 屬性。The following code sample demonstrates using the Condition property of a node. 這個範例取自[錯誤處理流程圖活動使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)範例。This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
